ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications: abacavir lamivudine tablets , combination antiretroviral agents , indicated treatment human immunodeficiency virus type 1 ( hiv-1 ) infection .
contraindications: • initiating abacavir lamivudine tablets , screen hla-b * 5701 allele abacavir lamivudine tablets contains abacavir . ( 2.1 ) • adults : one tablet orally daily . ( 2.2 ) • pediatric patients weighing least 25 kg : one tablet daily . ( 2.3 ) • abacavir lamivudine tablets fixed-dose tablet dose adjusted , abacavir lamivudine tablets recommended patients creatinine clearance less 30 ml per minute patients hepatic impairment . ( 2.4 , 4 )
warningsAndPrecautions: abacavir lamivudine tablets , usp available tablets . tablet contains 600 mg abacavir abacavir sulfate 300 mg lamivudine . tablets orange , biconvex film-coated , modified capsule-shaped , debossed 60 one side markings reverse side . packaged follows : bottles 30 tablets ( ndc 33342-440-07 ) . carton 30 tablets ( 5x6 unit dose ) ( ndc 33342-440-14 ) . carton 60 tablets ( 10x6 unit dose ) ( ndc 33342-440-98 ) . store 20°c 25°c ( 68°f 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15°c 30°c ( 59°f 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] .
adverseReactions: abacavir lamivudine tablets contraindicated patients : • hla-b * 5701 allele [ ( 5.1 ) ] . • prior hypersensitivity reaction abacavir [ ( 5.1 ) ] lamivudine . • moderate severe hepatic impairment [ ( 8.7 ) ] .
indications_original: Abacavir and lamivudine tablets, in combination with other antiretroviral agents, is indicated for the treatment of human immunodeficiency virus type 1 (HIV-1) infection.
contraindications_original: • Before initiating abacavir and lamivudine tablets, screen for the HLA-B*5701 allele because abacavir and lamivudine tablets contains abacavir. ( 2.1 ) • Adults: One tablet orally once daily. ( 2.2 ) • Pediatric patients weighing at least 25 kg: One tablet daily. ( 2.3 ) • Because abacavir and lamivudine tablets is a fixed-dose tablet and cannot be dose adjusted, abacavir and lamivudine tablets is not recommended in    patients with creatinine clearance less than 30 mL per minute or patients with hepatic impairment. ( 2.4 , 4 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Abacavir and lamivudine tablets, USP is available as tablets. Each tablet contains 600 mg of abacavir as abacavir sulfate and 300 mg of lamivudine. The tablets are orange, biconvex film-coated, modified capsule-shaped, and debossed with I 60 on one side with no markings on the reverse side. They are packaged as follows:
                  Bottles of 30 tablets (NDC 33342-440-07). Carton of 30 tablets (5x6 unit dose) (NDC 33342-440-14). Carton of 60 tablets (10x6 unit dose) (NDC 33342-440-98).
                  Store at 20°C to 25°C (68°F to 77°F); excursions permitted between 15°C to 30°C (59°F to 86°F) 
                     [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
